name: Soup Quest 2.0
description:
An updated version of 'Soup Quest' - a game made for the Paint Jam 2021  

The aim of the game is to collect all the soup cans and exit each level. You will have to explore and use your platforming skills  to traverse each level. 

What's New?
  • 3 new factory levels
  • A Boss Fight
  • There is now a story
  • New objects, such as turrets, bounce pads and spikes

The game now has around 20 - 60 minutes of content

Here is a link to the old game
